resources.string: Written by Ritayan Chakraborty (out386), for the Xperia Open Source Project. Intro images by Miradutta Pradhan.\nBased on OpenDelta by Chainfire and OmniROM.\nLibraries used:

This is the root of the location which the app will use as the working directory. Examples are:
/storage/emulated/0
/storage/BABB-4782
The app will not work if you select a location that needs root access to write to. You need at least 2 GiB free here.

The following updates are available. They are all deltas, so you need a base ROM to apply them to. Download them. Then, only if this is the first time you\'re using the app, move whichever XOSP ROM zip you have already flashed to the \"/sdcard/XOSPDelta\" directory. Pull down to refresh.

Could not connect to the download server, and there is no cached list of available updates. Make sure that you are connected to the internet. If the problem persists, contact your device\'s maintainer. Pull down to refresh.
You can select flashable zips here. The selected zips will be flashed through a recovery. Select your recovery\'s type below.
First, add some items to flash.
You cannot flash deltas. Go to \"Updates\" to apply them.
No base ROM and no deltas found. Please move the zip of whichever version of XOSP you have to the XOSPDelta directory in root of storage, and pull down to refresh the list of available builds.

No base ROM found. Please move the zip of whichever version of XOSP you already have to /sdcard/XOSPDelta. If this problem persists, that means that your ROM zip is too old. You will have to update manually by downloading a full ROM from XOSP.org.
No updates are available. It seems that you already have the latest version of XOSP. You can pull down to refresh the list of updates.
No suitable delta was found, even though one was expected. Pull down to update the list.
You have a new version ready to flash. Go to the Flash section to install it.
